overview: The journey of a middle-class Indian couple who work on learning and accepting their son’s sexuality and help make a comfortable ground for him to come out of ” the closet”, but when the actual truth comes out, they can’t come to terms with it. A perfect satire to bring out the importance and acceptance of the LGBTQIA+ community in India in the current times, the film is a fun ride that leaves you with thinking about much more than it projects.
title: Closets
